concept_data.title: representative of local or regional authority

summary: The concept of "representative of local or regional authority" pertains to individuals or entities designated to act on behalf of local or regional governing bodies within the European Union's legal framework. These representatives play a crucial role in the exercise of executive power and public service, facilitating the implementation of EU policies at the grassroots level. They ensure that local interests are adequately represented in broader legislative processes, fostering democratic governance. The responsibilities of such representatives may include engaging with citizens, coordinating public services, and liaising with other governmental entities, thereby enhancing the efficacy of regional administration and compliance with EU regulations.
